description.oldValue:
,Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). The RBAC controls will extend to the Microsoft 365 Defender portal for Information Protection and DLP related events. 
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
